Verses: 1 dhaaveedhudaiya Kadaisi Vaarththaigal Menmaiyaai Uyarththappattu, Yaakkobudaiya Dhevanaal Abishegam Petru, Isravelin Sangeedhangalai Inbamaaippaadina Eesaayin Kumaaranaagiya Dhaaveedhu Ennum Purushan Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal:
2 karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Ennaikkondu Pesinaar; Avarudaiya Vasanam Ennudaiya Naavil Irundhadhu.
3 isravelin Dhevanum Isravelin Kanmalaiyumaanavar Enakku Solli Uraiththadhaavadhu: Needhibararaai Manusharai Aandu, Theyvabayamaaith Thuraiththanampannugiravar Iruppaar.
4 avar Kaalaiyil Mandhaaramillaamal Udhiththu, Mazhaikkuppirpaadu Than Kaandhiyinaal Pullai Boomiyilirundhu Mulaikkappannugira Sooriyanudaiya Vidiyarkaala Velichchaththaippola Iruppaar Endraar.

5 ennudaiya Veedu Dhevanidaththil Ippadiyiraadho? Sagalamum Thittampannappattirukkira Nichchayamaana Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyai Ennudan Avar Seydhirukkiraar; Aadhalaal Ennudaiya Ellaa Ratchippum Ellaa Vaanjaiyum Valarndhonga Seyyaaro?
6 peliyaalin Makkal Anaivarumo, Kaiyinaal Pidikkappadak Koodaadhadhaai Erindhupodappadavendiya Mullukku Samamaanavargal.
7 avaigalai Oruvan Thodapponaal, Iruppaayudhaththaiyum Eettiththaangaiyum Kettiyaaip Pidiththukollavendum; Avaigal Irukkira Idaththildhaane Akkiniyinaal Mutrum Sutterikkappadum Endraan.

8 dhaaveedhukku Irundha Paraakkiramasaaligalin Naamangalaavana: Thakkemoniyin Kumaaranaagiya Yoseppaasepedh Enbavan Servaikkaararin Thalaivan; Ivan Ennoorupergalinmel Vizhundhu Avargalai Orumikka Vettippotta Adheenoesni Ooraanaanavan.

9 ivanukku Irandaavadhu, Akoyin Kumaaranaagiya Thodhovin Magan Eleyaasaar Enbavan; Ivan Pelisthar Yuththaththirkuk Koodina Sthalaththile Isravel Manushar Pogaiyil, Dhaaveedhode Irundhu, Pelistharai Nindhiththa Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalil Oruvanaayirundhaan.

10 ivan Ezhumbith Than Kaisaliththu, Than Kai Pattayaththodu Ottikkollumattum Pelistharai Vettinaan; Andraiyadhinam Karththar Periya Ratchippai Nadappiththaar; Janangal Kollaiyidamaaththiram Avanaip Pinsendraargal.
11 ivanukku Moondraavadhu, Aageyin Kumaaranaagiya Sammaa Ennum Aaraariyan; Sirupayaru Niraindha Vayalirundha Idaththile Pelisthar Eraalamaaik Koodi, Janangal Pelistharaik Kandu Odugirapodhu,
12 ivan Andha Nilaththin Naduvile Nindru Adhaik Kaappaatri, Pelistharai Madangadiththuppottaan; Adhanaal Karththar Periya Ratchippai Nadappiththaar.
13 muppadhu Thalaivarukkulle Indhamoondruperum Aruppunaalile Adhullaam Kebiyile Dhaaveedhidaththil Poyirundhaargal; Pelistharin Thandu Reppaayeem Pallaththaakkile Paalayamiranginapodhu,
14 dhaaveedhu Aranaana Oru Idaththil Irundhaan; Appozhudhu Pelistharin Thaanaiyam Bethlagemile Irundhadhu.
15 dhaaveedhu Bethlagemin Olimugavaasalil Irukkira Kinatrin Thanneerinmel Aavalkondu: En Thaagaththirkuk Konjan Thanneer Konduvarugiravan Yaar Endraan.

16 appozhudhu Indha Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalum Pelistharin Paalayaththile Thunindhu Pugundhupoi, Bethlagemin Olimugavaasalil Irukkira Kinatrile Thanneer Mondu, Dhaaveedhinidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Aanaalum Avan Adhaik Kudikka Manadhillaamal Adhaik Karththarukkendru Ootrippottu:

17 karththaave, Thangal Praananai Ennaamal Poivandha Andha Manusharin Raththaththaik Kudikkum Indhachcheyal Enakkuth Dhooramaayiruppadhaaga Endrusolli, Adhaik Kudikka Manadhillaadhirundhaan; Ippadi Indha Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalum Seydhaargal.

18 yovaabin Sagodharanum Seruyaavin Kumaaranumaana Abisaai Enbavan, Andha Moondruperil Pradhaanamaanavan; Avan Than Eettiyai Ongi Munnooruperai Madangadiththadhinaal, Indha Moondrupergalil Perpetravanaanaan.
19 indha Moondrupergalil Avan Menmaiyullavanaayirundhadhinaalallavo, Avargalil Thalaivanaanaan; Aanaalum Andha Mundhina Moondru Perukku Avan Samamaanavan Alla.

20 paraakkiramasaaliyaagiya Yoidhaavin Kumaaranum Kapseyel Ooraanumaagiya Penaayaavum Seygaigalil Vallavanaayirundhaan; Avan Movaap Dhesaththin Irandu Valumaiyaana Singangalaik Kondradhumallaamal, Uraindha Mazhaikaalaththil Avan Irangippoi, Orukebikkul Irundha Oru Singaththaiyum Kondrupottaan.

21 avan Bayangararoobamaana Oru Egipthiyanaiyum Kondrupottaan; Andha Egipthiyan Kaiyil Oru Eettiyirukkaiyil, Ivan Oru Thadiyaippidiththu, Avanidaththil Poi, Andha Egipthiyan Kaiyilirundha Eettiyaippariththu, Avan Eettiyinaale Avanaik Kondrupottaan.
22 ivaigalai Yoidhaavin Kumaaranaagiya Penaayaa Seydhapadiyinaal, Moondru Paraakkiramasaaligalukkulle Perpetravanaayirundhaan.
23 muppadhuperilum Ivan Menmaiyullavan; Aanaalum Andha Mundhina Moondruperukkum Ivan Samaanamaanavanalla; Ivanai Dhaaveedhu Than Meykkaavalarukkuth Thalaivanaaga Vaiththaan.
24 yovaabin Thambi Aasagel Matra Muppadhuperil Oruvan; Avargal Yaarenil, Bethlagem Ooraanaagiya Thodhovin Kumaaran Elkkaanaan,
25 aarodhiyanaagiya Sammaa, Aarodhiyanaagiya Elikkaa,
26 paldhiyanaagiya Eles, Ikkesin Kumaaranaagiya Eeraa Ennum Thekkoviyan.
27 aanadhoththiyanaagiya Abiyesar, Oosaaththiyanaagiya Mebunnaayi,
28 akogiyanaagiya Salmon, Neththobaaththiyanaagiya Magaraayi,
29 paanaavin Kumaaranaagiya Elep Ennum Neththobaaththiyan, Benyameen Puththirarin Kibiyaa Ooraanaagiya Ribaayin Kumaaran Iththaayi,
30 praththoniyanaagiya Penaayaa, Kaagaas Neerodaigalin Dhesaththaanaagiya Eeththaayi,
31 arpaaththiyanaagiya Abialpon, Parumiyanaagiya Asmaavedh,
32 saalponiyanaagiya Eliyoobaa, Yaasenin Kumaararil Yonaththaan Enbavan.
33 aasaariyanaagiya Sammaa, Saaraarin Kumaaranaagiya Agiyaam Ennum Aaraariyan,
34 maagaaththiyanin Kumaaranaagiya Akaspaayim Magan Elippeledh, Keeloniyanaagiya Agiththoppelin Kumaaran Eliyaam Enbavan.
35 karmeliyanaagiya Esraayi, Arbiyanaagiya Paaraayi,
36 sobaa Ooraanaagiya Naaththaanin Kumaaran Eegaal, Kaadhiyanaagiya Paani,
37 ammoniyanaagiya Selek, Seruyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yovaabin Aayudhadhaariyaana Peroththiyanaagiya Nagaraai,
38 idhriyanaagiya Eeraa, Idhriyanaagiya Kaarep,
39 eththiyanaagiya Uriyaa Enbavargale; Aaga Muppaththezhuper.
